revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Fiery Path |image = [[File:Fiery Path.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Fiery Path. |tokens = 17,000 |location = North of Mauville City, east of Lavaridge Town. }} '''Fiery Path''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 224,000 |- | Torkoal (Boss) || 700,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Machop * Grimer * Koffing * Slugma * Numel * Torkoal (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
